PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Every time we're about to order takeout, Senior Yinhu immediately pipes up to stop us, saying takeout isn't good for you, then offers to whip up whatever we want in the kitchen... We haven't ordered takeout in months!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM: His cooking really can't be beat, except for the fact he occasionally holds back on the meat... I really want to learn some of his recipes.
PartnerInfo.ProfileDesc:
Pan Yinhu, disciple of Yunkui Summit, serves as both the head chef and financial manager of Suibian Temple. He's proficient in martial arts, and an expert in pressure-point techniques.
As the one managing Suibian Temple's money, he's a master at keeping costs down and can bargain a 5,000 Denny piece of meat down to 500. If he can make something at home, he refuses to purchase it at a store, and no matter which big supermarket or shop you name, he's got a coupon for it tucked in his pocket.
Thanks to him, the members of Suibian Temple enjoy delicious yet budget-friendly meals every day. As the head of the kitchen, he demands precise flavor profiles and pays keen attention to his friends' opinions.
What's more, given his years of frugality, it's safe to assume that both the group's treasury and his secret piggy bank have ballooned to jaw-dropping levels.

TrustLv.1:
Pan Yinhu, disciple of Yunkui Summit, serves as both the head chef and financial manager of Suibian Temple. He's proficient in martial arts, and an expert in pressure-point techniques.
As the one managing Suibian Temple's money, he's a master at keeping costs down and can bargain a 5,000 Denny piece of meat down to 500. If he can make something at home, he refuses to purchase it at a store, and no matter which big supermarket or shop you name, he's got a coupon for it tucked in his pocket.
Thanks to him, the members of Suibian Temple enjoy delicious yet budget-friendly meals every day. As the head of the kitchen, he demands precise flavor profiles and pays keen attention to his friends' opinions.
What's more, given his years of frugality, it's safe to assume that both the group's treasury and his secret piggy bank have ballooned to jaw-dropping levels.
TrustLv.3:
Being a Panda Thiren, an exceedingly rare sight in New Eridu, Pan Yinhu has scraped by on his own since he was a child. Only someone who's truly known starvation understands its terror, and to fill his belly he sampled every trade he could find. In the end, his remarkable Ether aptitude led him to become a Hollow Raider.
As a Hollow Raider, he had a chance encounter with Yixuan. Following a harsh beating and a sudden spiritual awakening, he opted to become a disciple of Yunkui Summit, where he now practices the mystic arts to cleanse his then-increasingly violent nature.
Because he joined the sect later than most, he actually has very few junior disciples â€” and you, Master, are one of them. As your senior, he shows his care by cooking special dishes just for you and constantly sneaking store coupons into your pockets.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Unyielding Strikes
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launches up to four consecutive melee attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge: Light as a Swallow
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Sizzling Oil Supreme
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Perform a quick forward melee attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Moving Mountains and Seas
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Perform a melee attack on enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Moving Mountains and Seas
Special Attack: Sonic Pressure-Point Strike
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Delivers a forward melee technique while tossing firecrackers, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Touch of Death
Description.Desc:
With <color=#FFFFFF>Break Force</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Special>to activate:
<color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Touch of Death</color> attacks centered on the enemy, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
The skill can be chained up to three times. Each use of <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Touch of Death</color> consumes 1 point of Break Force.
When Pan Yinhu is the active character, DMG received during the skill is reduced by 40% and Anti-Interrupt Level is increased. If he isn't the active character, he becomes Invulnerable.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Mountainous Pulse Strike
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
<color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Mountainous Pulse Strike</color> unleashes a powerful strike forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Gain 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Break Force</color> on activation. Upon hitting an enemy, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> of the previous character in the squad.
Agents who enter the field via this Quick Assist will gain the Sheer Force bonus from the Core Passive. After switching out, Pan Yinhu will stay on the field and automatically launch <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Touch of Death</color> until his Break Force runs out, where he then leaves the field.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Mountainous Pulse Strike
Chain Attack: Anointed with Wok Steam
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Hop onto the Iron Wok and spin rapidly to ram into enemies, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> to all enemies on the way.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: A Feast Fit for an Emperor!
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Perform a technique that compresses qi into fried rice and catapults it at foes, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and healing all squad members for <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:100+AvatarSkillLevel(3)*60,1,2}</color> HP, while also applying a 8s heal over time on all squad members, recovering <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:0.8+AvatarSkillLevel(3)*0.05,1,2}</color>% HP/s.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Anointed with Wok Steam
Ultimate: A Feast Fit for an Emperor!
Quick Assist: Lift Your Gaze to Good Fortune
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Perform a melee attack on enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Intimidating Presence
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Ride the Momentum
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Perform a melee attack on enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Lift Your Gaze to Good Fortune

1421003.Name: Special Attack: Touch of Death (With Break Force)

1421004.Name: EX Special Attack: Mountainous Pulse Strike

1421006.Name: Dodge Counter: Moving Mountains and Seas

1421007.Name: Chain Attack: Anointed With Wok Steam

1421008.Name: Ultimate: A Feast Fit for an Emperor!

1421009.Name: Quick Assist: Lift Your Gaze to Good Fortune

Name: Core Passive: Meridian Enlightenment
Additional Ability: Iron Stomach
Desc: For a brief period when Pan Yinhu's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Mountainous Pulse Strike</color> hits an enemy and triggers Quick Assist, the next Agent entering through a Quick Assist or Chain Attack will gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Meridian Flow</color> effect. This effect provides a Sheer Force boost equal to <color=#2BAD00>9%</color> of Pan Yinhu's initial ATK and lasts for 25s. The Sheer Force provided by this effect cannot exceed 540 points.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</color> character or shares the same Faction:
When Pan Yinhu hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Touch of Death</color>, the enemy suffers the <color=#FFFFFF>Depleted Qi</color> effect, increasing DMG from all units against the target by 20%. Each hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Touch of Death</color> inflicts a 10s <color=#FFFFFF>Depleted Qi</color> effect. This effect does not stack, but repeated hits on the same enemy will extend the duration.

This effect provides a Sheer Force boost equal to <color=#2BAD00>10.5%</color> of Pan Yinhu's initial ATK and lasts for 25s. The Sheer Force provided by this effect cannot exceed 540 points.

1.Name: Qi Shield
1.Desc: All units deal 10% increased DMG to enemies affected by <color=#FFFFFF>Depleted Qi</color>.
1.Desc2:
This Yunkui technique wards off the external flow of Ether while reinforcing your inner meridians and muscles. With qi acting as a shield, no blade or spear can pierce it â€” this is Pan Yinhu's secret to enduring every blow.
Side note: this trick comes in extra handy when you're elbow-to-elbow with aunties and uncles fighting over supermarket sale items.

2.Name: Yunkui Pressure-Point Strike
2.Desc: For every 6 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Break Force</color> consumed, Pan Yinhu will recover 4 Energy, and the <color=#FFFFFF>Depleted Qi</color> effect applied when <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack: Touch of Death</color> hits an enemy will have its duration increased to 12s.
2.Desc2:
"Heh, can't move an inch now, can you, thief?"
"This technique is called Yunkui Pressure-Point Strike â€” it both paralyzes the body and clears the meridians â€” it's our sect's ultimate technique for punishing evil and upholding justice!"
"...Eh? You mean my grip was so strong that you just went numb? ...Alright then â€” can you move or not?"

3.Name: Non-Meridian Pressure Point
3.Desc2:
"These pressure points are a lot like us Panda Thirens."
"They're few and scattered, don't fit into any one system, and hardly anyone's ever studied them. It's a shame."
"But they really catch people off guard as a surprise weapon. Pretty great, right?"

4.Name: First-Class Head Chef
4.Desc: When <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: A Feast Fit for an Emperor!</color> heals all squad members, the HP recovery is increased by 25%, and the healing over time effect is increased by 25%. On activating <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: A Feast Fit for an Emperor!</color>, gain the <color=#FFFFFF>Backup Provisions</color> effect. Whenever any character in the squad loses HP, consume the <color=#FFFFFF>Backup Provisions</color> effect to instantly restore 50% of the HP recovered with <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: A Feast Fit for an Emperor!</color>'s instant HP recovery effect. This effect does not stack.
4.Desc2:
The first time he cooked, he nearly set the stove on fire. Among those who rushed to help was a chef who, looking at the pile of burnt food, used the unused eggs to make him a plate of fried rice.
He wolfed it down with tears in his eyes. When he finally looked up, the cook was holding out a slip of paper with "100" written on it.
"I understand, Master! You're teaching me in cooking, you have to give it 100%, right?" "No, I'm saying it's 100 Dennies per bite, and you've had over a hundred bites. Time to pay up."
From that day on, Pan Yinhu insisted on cooking for himself and never messed up again. And that's how a first-class chef was born.

5.Name: "Thiren"
5.Desc2:
In the sprawling city of New Eridu, Panda Thirens are extremely rare. He's always bristled at curious stares and long ago gotten used to living a lonely life with nobody to support him.
It wasn't until he became an apprentice on Yunkui Summit that he stopped feeling so isolated.
And once he realized that many citizens would even pay to take a photo with a Panda Thiren... he no longer minded the stares.

6.Name: Meridian Theory
6.Desc: The <color=#FFFFFF>Meridian Flow</color> effect provided by <color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Meridian Enlightenment</color> increases by an extra 6% of Pan Yinhu's initial ATK. The maximum Sheer Force provided by this effect increases to 720.
6.Desc2:
"There's an old saying that there are 365 pressure points in the feet. Funny â€” it's the same with how we live our lives."
"Here â€” pick whichever point you like from this chart."
"That point represents your current way of life â€” where it is or what it does doesn't matter. As long as you like it, that's enough."
"And what good is choosing it, you ask? Let me think... Ah, of course. Next time I deal with some thieves, that's the point I'll target!"
